dc_title_s: Vernal Pools: Holland's Central Valley, Russian River Basin, California, 1998
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile was derived from the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service and California Department of Fish and Game's Holland's Central Valley Vernal Pools coverage data. These data represent the portion of Holland's Central Valley Vernal Pools polygon coverage that is within the watershed boundaries of the Russian River basin.This layer can be used for watershed analysis and planning in the Russian River region of California.
